title: Is Malzahar no longer from Shurima?
body: I'm not seeing him on there. His original story was that he was a shuriman who travelled to Icathia and pretty much became a vessel for the void. Is that being dropped, or is he being kept for another "mass lore release"?

replies.body:
He abandoned his ties to shurima long ago. He is definitely not getting ret-conned out of there any time soon ether, as Taliyah has a specific quote towards him about how he turned his back on shurima.

His place is with the void now, and I heavily suspect that he will be considered for coverage in a void-based event.
From his current splash, he seems barely human. I wonder if he even bleeds.
Not when his passive is up for sure.
He probably does. But it'd be equated to grape jelly than tomato paste.
All right, thanks for clearing that up. Also clears up how you guys are doing those releases.
wut where does it say kass lived in Shurima
Old lore, post-retcon lore. He and Malz were from the same tribe too methinks.
man lore really is hard to find
mage update lacking mage lore and even with a shurima lore update , for shame
I mean, there's mages from all over the entire world. That would be either one huge event or one really confusing one (maybe both).
For Shurima, being a desert and all, like most deserts, probably has area where people don't go, hence why Icathia is so mysterious.
Probably because Rek'Sai will rip your face off if you show up there, as seen in her teaser video.

From the looks of it,they'll make a page like this for each region.
Meaning that we'll eventually get a void page and Malzahar(and rek'sai) will likely be part of that page.

I assume that with his new found power, he doesn't really have any ties or connection to Shurima anymore. 

All his attention is at bringing the void to Runeterra and the goings on back home, however extravagant, probably don't concern him anymore.
thats a good point , but i still have to wonder why the ascended returning wouldnt peek the voidlings interest
I dont think malzahar cares about shurima anymore. He is currupted by the void.
As if RIOT ever really cared about any lore. they change stuff whenever they see it fit for a new Champion, new map or whatever...
